title: 500ms Ping Spikes & Disconnectst
body: Hello support! I've been disconnecting from my game for about 30 secs to a minute every few minutes for the past few days, and I'm not sure why. I don't think it's my internet connection  because it does it both at my parent's house and at my apartment. I've tried using the Hextech Repair Tool but whenever I try to tell it to force re-patch it errors out and I have to close it. Reinstalling via the tool doesn't help either. I can submit logs if you know which ones to submit! I'm at a loss for what to do and I want to cry out of frustration, please send help!

replies.body:
It might still be a connection issue, but it's less to do with a network problem and more to do with routing. First thing I'd suggest trying is [**configuring your DNS**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and/or swapping to a public DNS.

If you still experience those problems even after that, another solution is [**clean-booting your system**](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/929135). Also, following these steps will ensure that no other programs are interfering with LoL:
> Press [Windows Key] + R
> Type msconfig into the text bar at the bottom of the menu
> Click on the Services tab
> Check Hide all Microsoft services so you don't end up accidentally disabling a key process
> Click the Disable All button
> Click on the Startup tab
> Click on the Disable All button
> Click on the Apply button
> Click on the OK button
> Restart your computer

Let me know if you're still getting those momentary DC's after trying these steps, or feel free to [**ticket Tech Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more in depth help from them too! :)

THANK YOU! 
My game is working perfectly now, and I can once again wreak having as Miss Fortune! 
You are a lifesaver, Rioter, and I wish you all of the Soulstealer Vaynes and Hextech Annies<3
Sweeeet, glad to hear you're back in the game and wrecking face bounty hunter style! ;D
